-e ---

𓏛 term > -ātum tum tyma
𓏛 𓏏 𓏤 | book | •tčōm ϫⲱⲙ čōm tum tuma

𓍃 tum don't मत mat 𓅓𓍃 mnot 𓂜

We use '™' as abbrevation for TUM < terminal 𓏛

𒁴 -tim ⋍ 𒌈 -tum
𒌈 -tum abstract noun suffix ⇔ -tion -ty -𒁴 tim 𒌈 tum e.g. Reichtum
𒌈 dom e.g. freedom > ism

𒌈 tum ≈ tion :
𒉌𒅅𒌈 (ṣal)li₂ig-tum “selection”

𒌅 TU -ty -tum 𒀊𒁍𒌅 ab-bu-tu fatherhood

𒉆 SÍN šīm
𒉆 SIM < TUM ?
𒉆 šīmtum “fate” ☑

تمام entirety 𓊃 completeness

𒁀𒀸𒌈 bosstum⋍dignity ⇔ Baat & Baal

⇔ 𒊺𒂊𒁺𒌝 guardian (še-e-du-um sic)

⇔ 𒉌𒅖 ni-iš -ness suffix
⇔ 𒉌𒅎 ni-im -nion nim

𓅓 𓆑 𓂓 𓏏 𓈓 | turquoise | maavkit ⇔ avkit.ma
𓂝 𓆑 𓎡 𓏏 𓈓 𓅓 𓄿 | turquoise | avkit.ma ⇔ avkit.on ⲟⲭⲓⲱⲛ okhiōn +++
𓂝 𓆑 𓎡 𓏏 𓈓 𓅓 𓄿 | turquoise | avki.tum 𓏏 𓈓 𓅓 𓄿

Elusive / lost / silent -tum (french -ent)
𓂋 𓊃 𓌘 𓏲 𓏏 𓁹 𓏥 | dream | recent rising risen arise երազ eraz resver™ > rêve 🤍 ☑

Mahātmā Mahā.tmā "great-souled" "venerable"

𒀀𒅈𒌈 mu.ar{tum} մարջան marǰan مَرْجَان marjān 𓈗 "coral"

𒅗𒅆𒅆 ka-ši-ši Kassierer 𒅗𒅆𒅆 debt-exactor

𒆠𒅖𒊭𒁴 ki-iš-ša-tim Kassierertum 𒆠𒅖𒊭𒁴 debt servitude
